name: Heart: Not Needed (Mimijackz, Brady The Bloody)
name_original: Heart: Not Needed (Mimijackz, Brady The Bloody)
description:
in Heart: Not Needed, you play as a man in a roguelike game, where you run through a row of rooms, with monsters and obstacles to tackle. you can buy new weapons and get new scores.

made by Mimijackz and BradyTheBloody
